module.name: Asterisk SIP Settings
module.description: Use to configure Various Asterisk SIP and PJSIP Settings
module.changelog: *16.0.26* Packaging of ver 16.0.26 *16.0.25* FREEPBX-23656 *16.0.24* FREEPBX-23631 *16.0.23* FREEPBX-21423 SIP and PJSIP ports odd after Legacy restore from 2.10 *16.0.22* Reverting Bootstrap and dependent libs fixes *16.0.21* Packaging of ver 16.0.21 *16.0.20* FREEI-4793 *16.0.19* FREEI-4436 - Restore - Ability to select modules to ignore *16.0.18* SCD-223 created gql api to modify ws settings *16.0.17* Packaging of ver 16.0.17 *16.0.16* FREEPBX-22914 *16.0.15* FREEPBX-22741 removed sip/pjsip port notification in the dashboard *16.0.14* FREEI-3303 allowing taskprocessor for asterisk version greater than 13.35.0 or 16.2.0 and higher *16.0.13* FREEPBX-20610 PJSIP should use cert+chain file not pem file with key *16.0.12* FREEI-3260 new GQL api's for Asterisk SIP NAT settings *16.0.11* FREEPBX-22361 Asterisk 18 integration *16.0.10* FREEI-3073 Error - Pjsip Keep alive Interval button not working (Sipsetting) *16.0.9* FREEI-2827 Add pjsip logger toggle to Asterisk Logfile settings *16.0.8* Packaging of ver 16.0.8 *16.0.7* FREEI-2761 white space issue *16.0.6* FREEI-2761 White spaces provokes transports going off *16.0.5* FREEPBX-21970 taskprocessor_overload_trigger in pjsip.conf *16.0.4* Packaging of ver 16.0.4 *16.0.3* FREEI-1541 Revert back commit 9723a2142f6 it is not required here we are handling this in sipstation *16.0.2* FREEI-1541 Equals in turnpassword breaks SIPStation config page *16.0.1alpha* 16.0.1 alpha release
